column4: Has anyone encountered problems with an ISO for Ubuntu?  I tried installing it and it wouldn't install.  I got an error message indicating that ata4: SATA Link down (sstatus 0 Scartd 300), and another ATA5 and ATA6 with the same message.  What do these messages mean?
do an MD5SUM or SHASUM on the iso
md5 <filename> .. then look at the download site.. see if the md5sums match
i'm guessing alot of folks don't know the difference.. and they'res really no advantage of using 64bit for the most common desktop out there..
